extendedInfo.description: Move to the side, hard-to-control soccer !A soccer game with easy controls that everyone can learn in 1 second.Beat the opponent with fancy lethal shots such as dragon shoot, ice shoot and lightening shoot and win the tournament.You can also matchup with friends or global users through the gamecenter.Play this fun soccer game anytime, anywhere.â â  FEATURES â â + Various 33 Avatars & Unique Special Shot !!+ 4 Game mode (Arcade, Tournament, Survial, League)+ Online Multiplayer via Google Play Service+ Physics based gameplay (Box2d)+ GameCenter Leader boards+ Submit Facebookâ â  D&D DREAM GAMES â â + Dinosaur Slayer+ Zombie Sweeper+ Crasher+ IChallenger: Return+ Tiny Brush+ Millionaire Show> Website: www.dnddream.com> e-mail: Game@dnddream.com> Facebook: Facebook.com/dnddream

reviews.comment: Awesome game, but I have a bug where the ball is stranded  where it starts to drop, in the top of the screen, and it gives a point to the opponent. Fix this and I will give 5 stars
reviews.author: samit ranjan

reviews.title: Favorite game; better multiplayer please!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite game, no doubt,  but I really want to play with my friends. Can you add a Bluetooth capability, likenyour iOS application, and maybe even make it so that you can play with Apple users? If YOU improve the multiplayer feature, I will love this game to no end. Thanks for making an amazing single player all the same!
reviews.author: Drew Gregory

reviews.title: Multiplayer is a laggy pile of tripe
reviews.comment: Ball disappears/doesn\'t move for seconds at a time then appears somewhere completely different (often in a goal). Wrong animations play frequently, often in comical fashion. Ball regularly goes straight through players, even when a special move is charged. Ball gets \"stuck\" in the goal, rewarding the player with multiple goals. I could go on and on with many more examples of inconsistent behaviour.
reviews.author: Dan Head

reviews.title: Works fine xD
reviews.comment: This game works fine for me :)
reviews.author: Darryl Dobbs

reviews.title: Still Not Fixed !
reviews.comment: Game still closes automatically find a fix for this !!!

reviews.title: Good

reviews.title: Should have bluetooth multiplayer instead
reviews.comment: I have many friends that uses iphone, i cant challenge them. And the multiplayer laggs allot as it is using internet, so it is not fun at all. I do hope you people see this and fix:)

reviews.title: Excellent mobile experience
reviews.comment: The game is simple but very addictive, you get chances to upgrade different skills and add items, it also has a wide range of characters, in short it\'s a great mobile experience

reviews.title: Bluetooth?
reviews.comment: I love the game, but my friends all use iPhones and ipods.  I\'d appreciate if you added Bluetooth so that I may play this game with them. There is also a glitch where the ball gets stuck in midair and gives a random amount of points to the opponent.  (This often happens in League Mode) And as an exaggeration ADD BLUETOOTH TO THE GAME\302\241!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!\302\241\302\241\302\241\302\241\302\241\302\241\302\241\302\241
